theJungle:ForkInTheRoad.NAME: Fork in the Road
DESCRIPTIONS:
You continue on your journey through the spire.
 NL After a long trek, you come upon a fork in the road.

 NL NL There is a signpost, but you can't make out the writing.

 NL  NL To your left you spot the outline of #btall #bbuildings in the distance, while the path to the right shows #ggrass and #gtrees.

theJungle:River.NAME: Spirit River
DESCRIPTIONS: Lost and thirsty, you are pleasantly surprised by a river running across your path. However, a cautious taste of the water reveals a suspicious taste...
Drinking the water, you initially feel ~refreshed~ , however, you soon feel ~unwell~ from drinking the tainted water.
Not wanting to take a risk, you ford the river and move on.

theJungle:ShamanCauldron.NAME: A Mysterious Cauldron
DESCRIPTIONS:
As you trudge through the jungle you spot a cave with faint green smoke pouring out.
 When you enter, you spot a lone figure wearing traditional shaman's attire crouching on the floor beside a bubbling cauldron.
 Rocking back and forth, he looks up at you, letting you catch a glimpse of green skin.
 NL " #y@KIKIKIKIKI@ you MUST try my latest brew, I've made a delicious potion for you!
 NL I'm missing #bone #bkey #bingredient you see, either your #gpotions or your #rblood... what will it be?"

You cautiously extend your arm and the shaman eagerly grabs it and holds it over the cauldron. 
 NL NL #r@SLICE@ NL NL 
 The shaman cackles as the brew turns into a murky brown color.
 The figure leans forward and his long tongue slithers out and tastes it.
 He shudders. NL NL " #y@PEEEEEERFECT@ "

You walk forward and dump your potions into the cauldron. 
 The shaman cackles as the liquid turns into a murky brown color, stirring it quickly.
 The figure leans forward and his tongue, long and pink, ~slithers~ out and tastes it.
 He @shudders@. NL NL " #y@PEEEEEERFECT@ "
You turn around and walk away. He's clearly too obsessed with potions.
You fill up your potion slots. Hopefully you made the right choice.

theJungle:SneckoCultEvent.NAME: Cult of The Snecko
DESCRIPTIONS: Parting through the jungle trees, you come across a clearing with a ~strange~ altar in the center. NL Around it, you see various figures in robes and ceremonial gear surrounding a small Snecko. The @joyful@ laughter of children can be heard in the distance.

You walk straight to the altar in the center. NL NL Something about this sphere irritates you... NL The priest turns to you, singing loudly with a high pitch: #g~"Aall~ #g~hai-iil~ #g~to~ #g~Snecko!"~ NL You realize that the sphere in his hands is actually an exceptionally large eye. It gazes at you with an immense power, pulling your mind in. ~It~ ~is~ ~hard~ ~to~ ~resist...~ NL #g@"Aaall@ #g@hai-iiiil@ #g@to@ #g@Snecko!"@ NL No, this was not you who just sang along, right?

One of the children almost discovered you by searching for a hideout. You suggest to the tribal children that you could play #phide-and-seek with them. NL "Deal, and you will win a prize if you find all of us!" NL NL Well, you are a bit older than them, but you don't know this place as well as they do... After a while of searching, the priest hints you to a stone plate. There you find all of them giggling together. The oldest one hands you a small animal as prize.

You hear children playing on a clearing. Lurking behind two trees, you catch a sight that leaves you puzzled: You see #bchildren of the local tribe playing with small green toy reptils. They are running around a rounded stone altar where a #bmasked #bpriest is preparing some kind a ritual involving a big white sphere. NL It seems like nobody here would harm you, with these children running around... NL Where should you go?

theJungle:SneckoIdol.NAME: Snecko Live!?
DESCRIPTIONS: #g~SNECKO~ #g~SNECKO~ #g~SNECKO~ NL @Thunderous@ applause breaks out as a girl in a Snecko onesie finishes a song and dance on stage. NL "That was 'You Confuse My Heart'"! NL #g~ENCORE~ #g~ENCORE~ #g~ENCORE~ NL Maybe it wouldn't be such a bad thing to stick around?

You decide to stay for the #g~jammin'~ tunes. The energetic concert @flows@ into your veins and you can't help but stay around to gather your newfound obsession's autograph. NL " #g@Hey!@ ", the girl in the Snecko Onesie beams at you. "Here's my autograph!" NL You take it and walk off knowing you just spent time #robsessing over an idol.

Overcome with #r@rage@ from seeing another Snecko, you draw your weapon and charge towards the stage. The #r@HORDE@ of idol fanatics push you back and don't let you pass. NL On the bright side, they dropped some Snecko merch you pawn off to fans who couldn't get into the audience.
Deciding this was not worth your time, you leave the concert alone.

theJungle:ExcessResources.NAME: Nature's Temptation
DESCRIPTIONS: After wandering through the jungle for what feels like an eternity, you come across a clearing with #pfruits neatly arrayed in the middle. NL NL You are #r@hungry@ from stumbling through this blasted place and would #p~love~ to eat some despite how bad of an idea that would be.

You #p@MUST@ have some. You eat one, then another and when you've had your fill, just one more is all you need. NL Only 3 fruits remain: NL NL A somewhat tainted #rStrawberry looking like it would #rhurt to eat. NL A ~juicy~ #gPear that makes you #ywant #yto #ytake #ya #ybreak just looking at it. NL A #yMango which is so big that it would #ySlow you down.
It would be foolish to partake in this obvious trap. A lone #rberry lies in a corner, it will suffice.
You take that last #ydelectable #ytreat and put it in your mouth. It #r@sizzles@ and #r~burns~ on its way down.
Nobody could deny such a #p@gift@ in your circumstances. With each bite, you feel your motivation being #y~sapped~ .
Where do you even start? The fruit seems to bear more of its #r~delicious~ #r~flesh~ every time you look at it. NL NL ~...~ NL NL When you finally finish, you feel stuffed and #yslow .
OPTIONS: [Give in] Give in to your desires.

theJungle:GremlinQuiz.NAME: Gremlin Quiz Show
DESCRIPTIONS: " LIGHTS. CAMERA. #p@ACTION!@ " NL NL A gremlin with a wide smile approaches you. NL NL " It's time again for the Spire-Famous Gremlin Quiz Show! I've got questions for you, here's your chance to win some #gfabulous #gprizes! NL Are you ~R~ ~E~ ~A~ ~D~ ~Y~ ~?~ Of course you are! "
" Please wait while we tally your score... NL NL You got #b%d #bout #bof #b%d questions right! NL
#gYou #gdid #ggreat! NL Here is your prize. "
#rHow #rdisappointing... "
Do better next time. "
What is the name of the Bronze Automaton's biggest attack?
Identify the enemies in this picture.
theActAssets/images/events/quiz/identify1.png
Identify the enemies in this picture.
theActAssets/images/events/quiz/identify2.png
In what order (from left to right) do the Red Mask Bandits appear?
images/events/redMaskTomb.jpg

What card is this?
theActAssets/images/events/quiz/card1.png
Which of these enemies can make you weak?
Which of these enemies holds their weapon in their left hand?
How many tentacles does the Spire Growth have?

theActAssets/images/events/quiz/card2.png
What power is this?
theActAssets/images/events/quiz/power1.png
What power is this?
theActAssets/images/events/quiz/power2.png

theActAssets/images/events/quiz/curses1.png

theActAssets/images/events/quiz/relic3.png

theJungle:FauxPas.NAME: Faux Pas
DESCRIPTIONS: As you walk through a #gdense #gportion of the Jungle, walls of trees seem to ~bend~ ~and~ ~twist~ into a narrow passageway. You catch a flash of light reflecting off several pairs of eyes, #y~skulking~ in the #pshadows near the tunnel of trees, watching your approach.

You decide to explore the strange formation of trees. As you walk the path, you are constantly surrounded by the ~rustling~ ~of~ #g~leaves,~ hushed whispers, and @muffled@ @laughter.@ Eventually, you find yourself approaching a clearing in the dense trees, with a #ystrange #yeffigy located on a stump right in the center. Just when you think you're walking right into an ambush, a #ysmall #yorange #yfaux ~leaps~ from behind a tree and sits at the entrance to the clearing in front of you, eyeing you curiously.
You decide, this time, that discretion is the better part of valor and make your way around the cluster of trees.

Something about the #yplayful #yfauxes captures a rare part of your imagination. You decide to humor the #yfaux and, before you know it, you find yourself caught up in their various games. NL NL Some time later you find yourself back at the entrance of the trees, out of breath but with a #rrenewed #rvigor for your quest.

A #p~hushed~ #p~silence~ falls over the clearing, and you could swear you see the faux's expression change to one of #p~deep~ #p~sadness.~ You turn to look at a quiet @sniffle@ you hear to your right, but there is nothing. When you look back, the faux's leader is gone. NL NL All that's left is the #ystrange #yobject on the stump, which you decide to take back with you, along with a deep #psense #pof #pshame for having disappointed the forest's critters.

You can only assume this is a trap. You decide to turn and flee. NL NL The fauxes begin crying excitedly. #b"A #brace?" #g~"I~ #g~love~ #g~races!"~ #p"I'll #p@definitely@ #pwin #pthis #ptime!" #r"Wow, #rthis #rone #ris #rfast!" NL NL The voices close in, but you stay just ahead of them. Just when you think your lungs might give out, you burst out into the open, outside of the maw of the forest. Your pursuers stop, and silence falls. NL NL After you catch your breath, you notice a small sack lying on the ground, #yfilled #ywith #ygold. Attached is a note simply saying #p"winner!" NL NL What strange creatures.

Before you can react, he speaks. #y"Are #yyou #your #ynew #yfriend?" NL NL Chattering voices suddenly fill the forest around you. #g"I #glove #gnew #gfriends!" #b"Do #byou #bthink #bthis #bone #bwill #bstay #ba #bwhile?" #p"Oh #pit's #pbeen #p~so~ #p~long!"~ #r"I'm #rso #rexcited #rto #rplay #rwith #ryou!" NL NL The faux speaks again. #y"It's #ygoing #yto #ybe #y@so@ #y@much@ #y@fun!@ #yDon't #yyou #yagree?" NL NL Do you agree?

theJungle:LostInTheJungle.NAME: Lost in the Jungle
DESCRIPTIONS: You have lost your orientation, and the way ahead is blocked by rubble. You cannot move further. NL NL Where should you turn to climb higher?
You climb a nearby vine, the weight of your relics dragging you down as the vine's thorns dig into your hands. NL NL As you reach the canopy, you spot a clearing nearby.
You reach a clearing in the jungle. It looks like someone has been digging here recently.
You use your shovel to dig up the ground. NL NL Very quicly you hit a chest, which is filled with #y
#ygold! NL NL Unfortunately, you are still lost.
You look around, and spot an abandoned shovel. This will prove useful later on. NL NL Unfortunately, you are still lost.

theJungle:Kidnappers.NAME: Misty Forest
DESCRIPTIONS: As you're traversing through the ~foggy~ ~jungle~ , a rope suddenly tightens around your ankle. NL #r@You've@ #r@been@ #r@caught@ #r@in@ #r@a@ #r@trap!@

A number of tribesmen surround you. They are wearing ~black~ ~robes~ and #r@scarves@ #r@for@ #r@masks@ . You can't help but feel #r~malice~ coming from them. NL NL "We caught one!" NL ~"Hey,~ ~this~ ~one~ ~doesn't~ ~look~ ~like~ ~a~ ~cultist...?"~ NL "You never know with those guys, #r@let's@ #r@get@ #r@'em...@ " NL You may have time to escape in the confusion.
You make it clear that you are #r~NOT~ a cultist, nor an enemy, and have no qualms with their clan. NL Negotiating is a bit #r@painful@ , but they let you go, for a small price.
You struggle hard, but manage to use your weapon and break through the rope while they approach. NL They give chase, while more tribesmen surround you!

Seeing as you are not a cultist or an animal, you manage to bribe them with #ysome #ygold. NL They untie you and let you leave in piece, #r~but~ #r~you~ #r~can't~ #r~shake~ #r~the~ #r~feeling~ #r~that~ #r~someone~ #r~keeps~ #r~watching~ #r~you...~
OPTIONS: Remove a card from your deck.

theJungle:HappyBirthday.NAME: Happy Birthday
DESCRIPTIONS: While wandering the jungle, you come across... NL ...a birthday cake? NL NL A small note sits next to the cake. It reads: NL NL #b"Happy #bBirthday #bMTS! NL #b(Please #bonly #btake #bone #bslice) NL #b- #bkio"
You only take a single slice, just as the note asked. NL NL It's quite delicious.

Looking around, you see nothing stopping you from taking the whole cake. NL NL #gIt #gis #gextremely #gtasty, but soon you are overcome by a #r~sense~ #r~of~ #r~shame~ at the atrocity you have committed.

theJungle:JungleGarden.NAME: Jungle Garden
DESCRIPTIONS: Hidden deep in the jungle you find a lush garden, overflowing with fruits and vegetables. By some miracle, it seems to be untouched by the Spireblight.

You pick several gourds from the trees around the garden. They will prove useful for carrying around water, or blood. NL You can no longer fight as effectively while holding 5 gourds in your hands, but they are probably worth it.
It is delicious.

theJungle:StalkMarket.NAME: Stalk Market
DESCRIPTIONS: A lush greenfield greets you with a curved and flowered log arch as the entrance. Etched on it reads #g"STALK #gMARKET". As you explore this curiously peaceful area populated with varying denizens of the Jungle, you understand what this place is about. It's the largest gathering center for exotic #gplants and #ycrops with each creature holding harvest yields with #ystalk #ycertificates.

Scattered around are many plots and gardens where everything grows. You enter one and are greeted by a dapper-looking, ecstatic gremlin. NL NL "I've never seen your face here, you must be new to the #gStalk #gMarket! Would you like to buy a stalk from this plot? We have special #rfruits and #gvegetables no other plot has!"

"Oh, I understand... But we have plenty of harvests for adventurers on the go as well!" NL NL The gremlin gives you a personal tour through the field. She wasn't kidding; you don't recognize any of these plants, not even from before the #pSpireblight. NL NL "...and over here, we have #rflamangos, sweet and spicy! And my personal favorite just right here, the #rcreamberry! They're so rich in flavor inside!"
"So, interested? Also, please note we are only allowed to sell #bone harvest per visitor."

#g"Par #gsnip, a #ysimple but #ghealthy choice! Many of the stalk holders for this feed this to their kids! Still great for grown-ups!" NL NL After rinsing with water, you take a bite out of your farm-fresh #gpar #gsnip. You feel #yinvigorated!

#r"Flamango, #rspicier than you think! Almost as spicy as the notorious #papparition #ppeppers!" NL NL After rinsing with water, you slice your farm-fresh #rflamango into chunks. #r@Hot,@ #r@Hot,@ #r@Hot!@
#g"Shell #gpeas, they have quite the #ytexture! Just crunch the big pea and chew on the tiny ones!" NL NL After rinsing with water, you try out your farm-fresh #gshell #gpeas. You feel #ytough!

#r"Creamberry, the #babsolute #bdelicacy! Whoever created this really knows what #bmouth-watering is like!" NL NL After rinsing with water, you soak your farm-fresh #rcreamberry into your mouth. The #babsolute #bdelicacy indeed!

"I'm sorry, perhaps this plot isn't too interesting to you. Come back if you change your mind though!" NL NL You feel a little bad for not buying something given how much she seems to like her job, but so it goes.

Scattered around are many plots and gardens where everything grows. You enter one and are greeted by a #r@dapper-looking,@ ecstatic gremlin. NL NL "I've never seen your face here, you must be new to the Stalk Market! Would you like to buy a stalk from this plot? We have special fruits and vegetables no other plot has!"
